SEARCH
Module sc2002.scmb.grp1.hms
Package repository

Class AdministratorRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.AdministratorRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChangeSecurityQuestionInterface, checkHaveQuestionsInterface, PasswordChangerInterface, ValidationInterface
public class AdministratorRepository extends Object implements ValidationInterface, checkHaveQuestionsInterface, PasswordChangerInterface, ChangeSecurityQuestionInterface
The AdministratorRepository class provides methods to manage administrators in the Hospital Management System, including functionalities for validation, password management, and handling security questions. It interacts with the "Administrator.csv" file for data persistence.
